Module GNIOT_CRS_POS_PROJECT
Package com.gniot.crs.dao

Interface StudentDAOInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
StudentDAOImpl
public interface StudentDAOInterface
The StudentDAOInterface defines the data access methods required for student operations in the course registration system. These methods will include SQL commands for interacting with the database to manage course browsing, password changes, account information, and course enrollment.

  • Method Details

    • browseCatalogForCourses

      List<Course> browseCatalogForCourses()
      Retrieves the list of all available courses from the course catalog. This method will include SQL to query the database for the course catalog. a List of Course objects representing the available courses

    • accountInfo

      Student accountInfo(int studentId)
      Retrieves account information for a student. This method will include SQL to query the database for the student's details. studentId the ID of the student whose account information is to be retrieved a StudentDetails object containing the student's account information

    • currentStudentId

      int currentStudentId()

    • viewGrades

      List<Grade> viewGrades(int studentId)
      Adds a course to a student's enrolled courses. This method will include SQL to insert the course enrollment record in the database. studentId the ID of the student enrolling in the course courseId the ID of the course to be added
